item.title: 4 secrets about investing wisely
item.description:
4 secrets about investing wisely

Making your money work for you should be your ultimate goal. But where do you start? Here are 4 things you need to know before your start investing. [embedyt]http://youtu.be/LRClXqMJHg0[/embedyt]

item.title: 6 facts you need to know about chit funds
item.description:
6 facts you need to know about chit funds

Chit funds can be treated as a useful tool to save money in India. Whether you are a housewife or a business woman, you need to always take care of that you have parked your funds in a certified chit fund organization.

item.title: News today: Why should you bother?
item.description:
News today: Why should you bother?

Inflation on a rise: Prices of pulses, onions and vegetables increase India has been experiencing a sustained increase in the general level of prices for goods and services. Currently, there has been a sharp rise in the prices of pulses, onions and vegetables. The inflation level doubled up to 5.20% as compared to October 2015.

item.title: Five ways to earn by investing
item.description:
Five ways to earn by investing

Creating a second source of steady income is one of the best things you could do for yourself. Whether you are just starting your career, a professional or a housewife, a little extra money is definitely more than welcome, right? Here are five ways to make your money work for you.

item.description:
December | 2015 | Paisewali.com

Inflation on a rise: Prices of pulses, onions and vegetables increase India has been experiencing a sustained increase in the general level of prices for goods and services. item.title: Smart tips to ace a group interview
item.description:
Smart tips to ace a group interview

Did you just receive an interview call? You are obviously not sure if the next round will be a one-on-one interview or a group interview. Presence of mind and co-operation will help you ace your job interview.

item.title: Life Insurance policies: Types and benefits
item.description:
Life Insurance policies: Types and benefits

As a woman, you play multiple roles throughout your life. Managing home, career and finance make you a smart homemaker. Each one of us is concerned about the wellbeing of our family, isn't it?
